name: Back in school
description:
Why are you still here?

You decided to take a nip during class, but you got up late at night. The School has changed and you have to get out of here. So, Find the keys and Exit the School! It isn't that easy. Something is wrong, something is there and something is going to drive you insane. So don't do any mistakes!

Still in development:

Back in School is still in development, we are doing our best to release it very soon. You can download the music, by the way.
